Sunhawk pulled a grenade off each of the belts around
his chest.

Sunhawk: Dodge to one side and you blow up, to the
other and you get cover.  And I doubt you're fast
enough to get out of the way forward or back.

He threw a grenade on each side of Nightshade.

--- Jonathan <jhogan@...> wrote:
> > Sunhawk:  DEATH TO ALL PREDICONS!  YOU WILL ALL
> PAY A
> > HUNDRED FOLD FOR KILLIN SNOWOWL AND TAKING MY LIFE
> > FROM ME! AND SHAMING MY NAME FOREVER!
> >
> 
> {Nightshade}
> 
>     Nightshade watched the decsending arc of the
> energon blade, her head not
> moving til the last second when she simply dropped
> down on her belly letting
> the blade whistle harmlessly past her, feeling it's
> energy nick the tips of
> her pointed ears. As she straightened she rose
> backwards away from the
> rather enraged bot, transforming. With legs apart
> she waited for his next
> attack, her whip in her hand it's length rippling
> with energy.
> 
>     "This fight really isn't necessary. I don't know
> who this snowowl of
> yours is. Frankly, I don't care. What I do care
> about is meeting with your
> leader..." She spoke evenly as she watched his
> movements.
> 
>
